body:
Comment 1 by **lost.goblin**: 
Ed is a basic unix system tools, any *nix system that doesn't include it is broken, 
period.

The recent tendency of certain linux distributions not to include ed is very 
disturbing. Ed is still in many cases the fastest and most reliable way to edit a 
file.

Linux and gnu are *full* of bloated and redundant components, to argue that ed, one 
of the simplest and most elegant unix tools, should be dropped on such grounds is 
ludicrous.
